original_text: He decided how strong the wind must be. He decided the size of the seas. He decided how strong the wind must be. He decided the size of the seas. He decided how strong the wind must be.
korean_text: 바람의 무게를 정하시며 물의 분량을 정하시며

sentences.original_text: He decided how strong the wind must be.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바람이 얼마나 강해야 하는지 결정했다.

sentences.original_text: He decided the size of the seas.
